definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[שֶׁעִטְּרָה לוֹ]] Ct So 3:11 with which his mother crowned him (v. I. [[עֲטָרָה]]

); elsewh. fig.: 2ms. [[טוֹבָתֶָ ְעִטַּרְתָּ שְׁנִת]] Ps 65:12 thou (´[[י]]) hast crowned the year of thy goodness; Impf. 2 ms. sf. [[וְכַבוֹד וְהָדָר תְּעַטְּרֵהוּ]] Ps 8:6; Pt. sf. [[הַמְעַטְּרֵכִי חֶסֶד וְרַחֲמִים]] Ps 103:4 (of ´[[י]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. f. [[חׂר הַמַּעֲטִירָה]] Is 23:8 usu. Tyre the crown-bestower (Ges Ew De Che:Comm. Di Du Gu:Kau Skinner), but dub.; < the crown-wearer Hi Gr (after SyrVer), so Ren Che:Hpt. (rdg. [[הַמְּעֻטָּרָה]]).
